All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractPetition
Abstract class representing a generic petition.
Actions
Represents the actions that can be performed in the system.
AdminUser
Represents an admin user in the system.
AdminUserFactory
Factory class for creating instances of AdminUser objects.
AdminUserRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing AdminUser entities in the database.
AuthController
Controller class for handling authentication-related endpoints.
CompanyUser
Represents a company user in the system.
CompanyUserFactory
Factory class for creating instances of CompanyUser objects.
CompanyUserRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing CompanyUser entities in the database.
CreatePetitionActionListener
Listener implementation for handling the creation of petitions.
CreateUserActionListener
Listener implementation for handling the creation of users.
CustomPetitionDetailsService
Service class for managing custom petition-related operations.
CustomUserDetailsService
Service class for managing custom user-related operations.
DataSourceConfiguration
Configuration class for creating a DataSource bean.
EventListener
Interface representing an event listener.
EventManager
Manages event subscriptions and notifications.
HomeController
Controller class for handling home-related endpoints.
InvalidArgumentListException
Exception thrown when an invalid argument list is provided.
Main
Entry point of the petition platform application.
MainController
Controller class for handling main endpoint requests.
ManageUsersController
Controller class for managing users and petitions by admins and super users.
PasswordGenerator
Utility class for generating random passwords.
PetitionController
Controller class for managing petitions.
PetitionDetailsPrincipal
Implementation of UserDetails representing petition details.
Roles
Enumeration representing different roles in the application.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for Spring Security setup.
SimplePetition
Represents a simple petition in the system.
SimplePetitionRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing SimplePetition entities in the database.
SimpleUser
Represents a simple user in the system.
SimpleUserFactory
Factory class for creating instances of SimpleUser.
SimpleUserRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing SimpleUser entities in the database.
SuperUser
Represents a superuser in the system with extended privileges.
SuperUserFactory
Factory class for creating instances of SuperUser.
SuperUserRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing SuperUser entities in the database.
User
Represents a user in the system.
UserDetailsPrincipal
Implementation of UserDetails representing user details.
UserFactory<T>
Interface for user factories.
